name: 1. Accuchek
description: is a drug administered orally or intravenously and is used for treating chronic gout arthritis.

name: 2. Charak
description: Charak is an antibiotic used for treating certain bacterial infections. It belongs to the class of antibiotics known as fluoroquinolones. It is available in both tablet and suspension(liquid ) form for treating various diseases.

name: 3. Depura
description: Depura a antibiotic belonging to the penicillin group of drugs, which fights bacteria in your body. Amoxicillin is used to reduce the development of drug-resistant bacteria

name: 4. CTP
description: CTP is a mucolytic agent. It is used to treat respiratory disorders linked with viscid or excessive mucus.

name: 5. Digine
description: Digine is a third generation oral cephalosporin, effective against a wide range of sensitive gram-positive, gram-negative

name: 6. Everherb
description: Everherb is a broad-spectrum antibiotic, a bactericidal antibiotic, effective in Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacterial infections.

name: 7. Kapiva
description: Kapiva is a bactericidal which is active against a wide range of Gram-positive and Gram-negative organisms.

name: 8. Liveasy
description: Liveasy is an antibiotic belonging a class of drugs called cephalosporins. It is a second-generation cephalosporin antibiotic, which came to the markets of USA in 1977.

name: 9. ecosprin-75mg
description: ecosprin-75mg is an antibiotic belonging to the group of drugs called macrolide antibiotics. It is used to treat certain infections caused by bacteria

name: 10. Revital
description: Revital is a drug used for preventing and treating malaria. The disease is transmitted by the bite of a mosquito. The Chloroquine drug is also used for treating liver disease caused by protozoa.

name: 11. Seacod
description: Seacod is a semi-synthetic macrolide antibiotic, used for treating respiratory and urinary tract, soft tissue infections.

name: 12. Hansaplast
description: Hansaplast is a highly lipophilic, long acting ACE inhibitor.The drug is used for treating blood pressure and congestive heart failure.
